Association.description: GO domain/range constraint shape is defined as the domain, relationship, and range of a GO shape  expression rule

context.description: used to determine if this shape is used in the the visual pathway editor or the graphical editor.  Those shapes annotated with like this https://github.com/geneontology/go-shapes/pull/285/files will be exlcuded from the visual pathway editor but still included in the file so this file can be used in the graphical editor as well.

exclude_from_extensions.description: used to determine if this shape is used in the the visual pathway editor or the graphical editor.  Those shapes annotated with like this

is_multivalued.description: for this shape, the relationship in question supports multiple values in the object of the association.

object.description: The range of the relationship identified by the Relationship.id parameter (This contains the values can be provided in the object of a statement)

predicate.description: The predicate is the relationship between the domain and  range of the GO shape expression rule.

subject.description: The domain of the GO shape expression rule, this is the subject of the relationship.

Association.title: Association

Collection.description: A collection of GO domain/range constraint shapes.  This is primarily used in this schema to allow several  test data objects to be submitted in a single file.

goshapes.description: A collectionm of GO domain/range constraint shapes where a GO domain/range constraint shape  is defined as the domain, relationship, and range of a GO shape expression rule.

Collection.title: Collection

goshapes.description: A collectionm of GO domain/range constraint shapes where a GO domain/range constraint shape  is defined as the domain, relationship, and range of a GO shape expression rule.
